subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: In becoming the No 1.-ranked player in women’s golf, Lorena Ochoa has often spoken about the need to sacrifice, as she did Tuesday at Montclair State University in New Jersey.
snippet: In becoming the No 1.-ranked player in women’s golf, Lorena Ochoa has often spoken about the need to sacrifice, as she did Tuesday at Montclair State University in New Jersey.
